name: Caleb Knaack
coverLetter:
Hi there, 
My fiance and I recently relocated to The Dalles, Oregon where I am currently trimming on a small medical grow. I would really like to continue trimming full time after the outdoor season is over and would love any leads on place to rent or a trailer to buy. I can trim just over two pounds of outdoor per day and love the cannabis community. Also an avid skateboarder and guitar player.
